task.title: Install Atom
task.shortdesc: Step-by-step instructions to install Atom on your computer.

taskbody.context: Atom is a free, open source text editor developed by GitHub. For Mac users, Atom may be a good alternative to Notepad ++.

step.cmd: Go to . Above the Download button you should see listed your computer's specific operating system (OS) and version.
step.stepxmp:
You have a Windows laptop running Windows 10. When you go to Atom, the download button images below appears. Atom Download Button
Atom Download Button

step.cmd: If the the OS/version information is correct for your computer, click the Download button and follow the on-screen instructions to complete the installation.

info.p: If the OS/version information is NOT correct or you want to download Atom for a different operating system, then follow these steps:

substep.cmd: On the bottom left of the screen, click on the Other platforms button. You will be taken to Atom's latest version release page on GitHub. You can also get there by clicking this link:
Click the Assetsbutton to open the list of the current OS versions available to download.
To download, click on the appropriate file name for your platform.
Open the downloaded file and follow the on-screen installation instructions.
